contentrichtext.text: [[File:Мария Огненная.jpg|thumbnail|Ognyena Maria. Russian icon, 19th century.]] {{Unreferenced|date=February 2008}} in [[Slavic mythology]], '''Ognyena Maria''' is the "Fiery Mary," a fire goddess who assists and counsels the thunder God [[Perun|Piorun]]. This divinity also appears with southern slavs, and is usually considered to be the sister of the thunder god/saint. '''Ognyena Maria''' is feast in the folk calendar of the Slavs, which is celebrated on July 17. [[Category:Slavic goddesses]] [[Category:Fire goddesses]] {{euro-myth-stub}}
